amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that reaffirms United States policy of neutrality and commitment to a negotiated settlement to the conflict in Nagorno-Karabagh.
amendment.purpose: An amendment expressing the sense of Congress urging the Administration to take a greater leadership role in attaining a negotiated settlement of the conflict in Nagorno-Karabah.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
